rooms.description: Entryway that leads to the living space and private gym.
Spacious minimalist living area with large windows for ample natural light and a view of the garden, placed on the east side to enhance positivity according to Vastu.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring a simple design and neutral colors in keeping with minimalist aesthetics.
Compact, functional kitchen area placed in the southeast section to harness positive energy as per Vastu norms.
Dedicated private gym with minimalistic workout equipment and ample storage, positioned in the northwest part to avoid interference with the main living area.
Sleeping area designed for relaxation and privacy, located on the north side of the ground floor in adherence to Vastu guidelines for calmness.
Small, efficient bathroom placed near the bedroom and kitchenette for ease of access, with a south facing window to balance energy.

openings.description: Primary entrance door, oriented towards the north to maintain positive energy flow.
Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation, with an eastward view enhancing the living space.
Small ventilation opening in the private gym to ensure adequate airflow.
Window facing north for calm and restful ambiance.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with minimalist d√©cor, placed on the north side to promote relaxation and harmony as per Vastu.
Concise study or workspace integrated into the first floor for a seamless design transition, located on the east side to capitalize on natural light.
Additional bedroom space for guests, designed with minimalistic finishes and placed in the west section to maintain energy balance as per Vastu norms.
Modern en-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Large windows for optimal natural lighting and ventilation, adhering to minimalist design principles.
Balcony access providing additional outdoor space and garden view.
